subject: revert(api): restore original vercel.json builds config
body:
The api/ directory is a separate project deployed independently to Vercel.
The previous commit incorrectly removed the legacy builds configuration
as part of frontend debugging. Reverting to the original config that the
API project maintainer controls.

Tags: vercel, revert
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 3
Impact: infrastructure
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: interest-form
Semver: patch
